players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the first one to be killed. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we all stay safe."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana that we should keep a close eye on each other. It's important to ensure everyone's safety in this game."
Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance to keep each other safe and work together to identify the mafioso in our midst. Let's communicate openly and honestly with one another."
